# contentModificationDate

**Instance Property**

The date the item was last modified.

## Declaration

```swift
optional var contentModificationDate: Date? { get }
```

## Tracking Usage

- **creationDate**: The date the item was created.
- **lastUsedDate**: The date the item was last used.

items.description: The date the item was created.
items.name: creationDate

items.description: The date the item was last used.
